title: Jive
original_name: 放熱ＪＩＶＥ　ほうねつジャイブ
sinopse:
A series of 7 oneshots :

1. Jive
   When Himuro discovers his classmate Tsuzuki's secret, he presses Tsuzuki, an honor student, for an explanation, but instead finds himself trapped in a heated training session to break him...

2. Epicurean
   Iwasa is an salaryman with a secret leather fetish. His other obsession is his co-worker, Matunaga. What are the chances that Matunaga would ever agree to let Iwasa drape him in leather and chains?

3. Hold me Tonight (Dakishimete Tonight)

4. Sweet Little Devil

(Source M-U)
